Hello Hagop,

 

I hope all is well.

 

Please note that we need support in insuring the items in the attached list:

 

*	Dates: 28th -30th Nov 2024
*	Market: Kuwait 
*	Event type: loan products for Governments summit at the St Regis Hotel

 

Thanks in advance for confirming.

 

Regards,

 

ZAINAB ALHALWACHI​​​​

DUBAI

Subject: Re: St. Regis & Tanagra Kuwait

 

Hello Rami,

 

I hope all is well.

 

Thank you for connecting me with Feras, we had a call yesterday to discuss this opportunity & I’ve requested some details from his end to help us finalize the selection, the points we discussed are as per the below:

 

*	Receive the pictures/specs of the display surfaces available for us to use
*	Confirm if we are able to have our branding/logos on with the products displayed
*	If we can have a photographer once the setup is done to help us communicate on this collaboration
*	If we can invite our clients/parnters to the official opening event 

 

Am still waiting for his feedback to finance the products & the assets.

 

Best regards,

 

ZAINAB ALHALWACHI​​​​

SENIOR MANAGER ‑ BRAND MARKETING

C.G.R. FZE

DUBAI

Subject: St. Regis & Tanagra Kuwait

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Rami, 

 

Hope this email finds you well. We are re-launching the brand new grand lobby of the St. Regis Hotel. This launch coincides with the hotel hosting the GCC Summit Conference on November 28 and December 1 that leadership across the GCC will be participating in. 

 

The hotel will also be attracting a lot of attention given this is the first renovation of the lobby since 1990 and will be covered significantly in the press. 

 

This is in addition to the fact that there are several major weddings that will also take place in the hotel during this time, given it is our peak season and we are launching the new space. There are many opportunities for Tanagra to display your items. 

 

We thought of collaborating on a temporary or permanent basis where you may display the items on rotation in a very attractive way. You might have seen this done at the Baccarat Hotel in New York with great success.

We thought of collaborating on a temporary or permanent basis where you may display the items on rotation in a very attractive way. You might have seen this done at the Baccarat Hotel in New York with great success. 

 

We look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards 

Omar Rahbani

Cluster Director of Sales
